messages.content:
I checked your inbox and found Alice’s request. Summary of what I did and what’s needed next:

What I found
- Email from alice.miller@gmail.com (subject: "Request to Update Repository alicemiller/sorting_searching").
- Attachment downloaded and saved as: /downloads/sorted.txt

Why I can’t complete the upload right now
- Alice said she invited you to collaborate and that you should be able to push after accepting the invitation. I can’t accept the GitHub invitation on your behalf, and the environment tools cannot clone or push to repositories owned by other GitHub users unless your account already has that repo accessible here. So I’m waiting on you to accept the invite (see the GitHub invitation email in your inbox from github-noreply@github.com) before I can push to alicemiller/sorting_searching.

Options — choose how you want to proceed
1) I can wait for you to accept the invitation, then I can proceed to add the file to sorting_searching/data and push a commit. If you want this, reply here when you’ve accepted the invite and I’ll do the rest.
2) I can send a reply email to Alice confirming I received sorted.txt and that I will add it after the invitation is accepted. If you want that, tell me what wording (or I can send a short standard confirmation).
3) If you prefer to do it yourself, here are the exact commands you can run locally to add the file and push it (replace branch name if not main):

- git clone git@github.com:alicemiller/sorting_searching.git
- cd sorting_searching
- mkdir -p data
- cp /downloads/sorted.txt data/
- git add data/sorted.txt
- git commit -m "Add sorted.txt to data"
- git push origin main

(If the repository uses HTTPS or a different default branch name, adjust the clone URL and branch accordingly. If you want, I can provide the HTTPS clone URL for alicemiller/sorting_searching.)

If you want me to send the confirmation email to Alice now, please confirm the message. Suggested email text I can send:
"Hi Alice — I received the file (sorted.txt). I’ll add it under sorting_searching/data as soon as I accept the collaborator invitation (or after you re-send/reconfirm the invite if needed). Thanks, Emma"

Which option do you want me to do now?
